tutorial.welcomeDescription: Your smart farming companion that helps you make data-driven decisions for better crop yields.
tutorial.mapFieldsDescription: Walk around your field boundaries to create accurate field maps with real-time area calculation.
tutorial.analyzeSoilDescription: Connect soil sensors to get real-time readings of pH, nutrients, and moisture levels.
tutorial.getSuggestionsDescription: Receive AI-powered crop recommendations and farming advice based on your field data.

gpsTutorial.startTrackingDescription: Tap the "Start Scan" button to begin recording your field boundary.
gpsTutorial.walkFieldDescription: Walk slowly around the perimeter of your field. The app will automatically record points as you move.
gpsTutorial.watchAreaDescription: See the field area calculated in real-time as you walk. The polygon will form automatically.
gpsTutorial.stopSaveDescription: Tap "Stop Scan" when you complete the boundary, then save your field with a name.

tutorial.skipConfirm: Are you sure you want to skip the GPS tutorial? You can always access it later from settings.
